channel.title: Looking for a coding partner
channel.description:
Hello, I am looking for someone to code for me. I do not have much experience in java coding. I am looking for a partner to help me create a revision 508+(Not anything out of the 600s) PK server. I do have experience in html and css. I have all the finances for the server. We would own the server 50/50. I am looking for a partner that is very experienced in custom coding and fixing bugs. I do not want someone that says she/he is a coder because they can edit java code. I can edit java code myself. I need an experienced coder that is looking for a serious server.
Minimum requirements for the coder:
1. Have coded on a server before 2. Being able to talk on skype 3. Being open to ideas and criticism. 4. Able to create a PK Ticket system. 5. Custom coding, and fixing any bugs that we may have.
Things I would provide: 1. A website with a donate system. 2. A dedicated VPS 3. Ideas for the server 4. I can also help with anything trivial in the server ( Finding cordinates, placing npcs, creating shops) 5. Any other finances we may need.
You can contact me on here, but preferable contact me on skype or by email.
Skype: Razeleet Email: admin@racemanual.com

item.title: Looking for a coding partner
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

try reading all the rules and posting in the right section.

however, welcome to the community
